channel.title: Basic files client HELP
channel.description:
ok, here am i again the last time i got the same qeustion as now... `how do i start a server? ` :confused:
now i know that i just have to edit a other client, but i didn´t got an answer what i have to edit so... i take an expample : Fernanscape Link : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,408458.0.html
so what do i have to edit to make it a private server? i have to edit something at the gui file, but the IP is already 127.0.0.1 (so that´s already private IP, right?). please help me, i already got this qeustion a long time... thnx for listening :P ;D

item.title: Basic files client HELP
item.dc:creator: @kingkorrupt kingkorrupt
item.description:
@kingkorrupt wrote:

nkmol:

but i want it private so that i can play it by my self (testing models)

Then use the local host(127.0.0.1)

Read full topic

item.title: Basic files client HELP
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

127.0.0.1 is your localhost, if your ip on no-ip.com is … google.no-ip.info

then… the ip you put in that spot would be “google.no-ip.com”

Read full topic
